Posts.EditableText:
I'm trying to play a cutscene I created, but it's not loading....I'm just using run script when player enters room, and simply using run external file...the file is called Lost_TempleCutScene.mp4, but it's not playing. It's sorta like the game freezes or something, because it doesn't get past the script to show the room description...any ideas?

Thanks, 
Jeremy.
